description: When we try to delete an instance which is disabled terminate, the response is ok, but in fact not work, it's very unfriendly and easy to confuse user. it may be better to raise an exception that can be caught by client.
title: no error message when deleting disable terminate instance

comments.content: When we try to delete an instance which is disabled terminate, the response is ok, but in fact not work, it's very unfriendly and easy to confuse user. it may be better to raise an exception that can be caught by client.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~int32bit
